summary: I allways had a problem with the anamorphic lens flares - mainly because they never look like they are supposed to. So I sat down and tweaked... Tweaked... and Tweaked. Now tweaking has come to an end. Oh and this Plugin can be used with every ENB out there.
descriptionHtml:
Hello there, fellow traveler. I just want to share the Anamorphic lens flare from Aliaris ENB.
This is a one-of-a-kind anamorphic lens flare effect!

-- Woah, 7 Endorsements in just less than one single day?! Woohoo! --

Behind the scenes:


Aliaris is my growing Custom ENB project which allows you to build your very own ENB without
neverending tweaking and retweaking.
This is the Anamorphic lens flare you can download for Aliaris.
But do not worry, you can use this Plugin with EVERY enb wether it is a famous like Sharpshooters or Realvision or you own creation.


How to install

Just replace your "old" enbbloom.fx file with mine and the job is done.

How to uninstall

I let you guess...


images:
All my images are made with Aliaris ENB


If you have any suggestions or ideas - head over to my ENB project "Aliaris":
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53403/?
author: LaBeatBeatbox
